branchCategory.name: Vacuum Generator
branchCategory.description: <P>There are four vacuum generator models to choose from - two simple vacuum generators, AP 7 and AP70, and two modules, AP71 and AP72, which include vacuum generator, N2 inlet shut off valve and N2 inlet check valve. The modules provide a compact and cost effective solution for vacuum generator installations. The individual vacuum generators provide a variety of configurations. The devices are designed for use in gas delivery systems to improve efficiency when venting for purging. </P>
